node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #1607 宗個案患者的丈夫，過往健康良好，無外遊記錄，7 月 16 日開始發燒及咳嗽，由檢疫中心送院。
node.detail_en: The patient is the husband of patient #1607, has good past health, no recent travel history, started having fever and cough on July 16, and was transferred to hospital from the quarantine centre.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en:
Tsz Wan Shan Shopping
Centre Deluxe Cuisine
groups.description_zh: 慈雲山中心 7 樓百匯軒酒樓有員工及食客確診。
groups.description_en: Employees and guests of the restaurant Deluxe Cuisine on the 7th floor of Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre have tested positive.
